name: Baby Nursery Rhymes and Toddler Phone For Kids
name_original: Baby Nursery Rhymes and Toddler Phone For Kids
description:
-------Kids Poems------
Baby Nursery Rhymes and toddler phone. It will surely keep your kids enjoyed and entertained by the foot tapping songs. This app contains all famous Rhymes(poems) in English with visually environment, so that you can imagine what poet wants to say and children can learn and remember the poem easily.

Famous Rhymes:
* Baa, Baa, Black Sheep
* Nani teri Morni
* Humpty Dumpty
* Horsey horsey
* Little Nancy

Features:
* Can Read Rhymes
* Can Listen Rhymes

This is an ad supported application to help develolpers so that we can make more useful app as free
If you like this app then please give us feedback, we will love to work more on it. Suggestions are most welcome.

Developed By:
Indigo apps
